txt.en: '[placeholder], you must help me! It is my husband Tomos... he is a stubborn old warrior, and he has gone to fight the Dragon-clan alone.\n\n'He says that the White Hand does not do enough to protect Galtrev, and so he must do so himself... but he is missing his work while he is gone. They will surely kill him upon his return!'

'Hail, [placeholder]! Look... the Draig-l√ªth! I knew that they had settled nearby. They can smell the weakness of Galtrev.\n\n'I know I risk all to come here, but someone must deal with this menace. The White Hand does nothing but force us to labour for a war that does not help us.'

'Please help him and bring him back to me, [placeholder]. Tomos was a great warrior when he was a young man, but those years are behind us now. We should do as the White Hand commands, for they hold the power now....'
Taking Matters Into Their Own Hands
An elderly warrior of Galtrev, infuriated by the unwillingness of Isengard's guards to protect Pren Gwydh from the violence of the Dragon-clan, has decided to take matters into his own hands.

Tomos has escaped his forced labour to look into doing something about the Dragon-clan menace in Pren Gwydh.\n\nYou should seek out Tomos and help him so that he can return before the White Hand Overseers notice that he is gone.
